text: Bruno & Boots is a Canadian series of television films, based on Gordon Korman's Macdonald Hall series of young adult novels."Bruno & Boots MOWs go to camera". Playback, August 25, 2016. The films are produced by Aircraft Pictures for YTV,"Aircraft to produce Gordon Korman MOW for YTV". Playback, July 30, 2015. and star Callan Potter as Boots and Jonny Gray as Bruno."Stratford’s Callan Potter back on YTV Saturday in two new Bruno & Boots movies" . Stratford Beacon-Herald, March 29, 2017. The first film in the series, Go Jump in the Pool!, aired in 2016, while the second and third films in the series, This Can't Be Happening at Macdonald Hall and The Wizzle War, aired in 2017. This Can't Be Happening at Macdonald Hall received a Canadian Screen Award nomination for Best Limited Series or Program at the 6th Canadian Screen Awards in 2018. ==References== Category:2016 Canadian television series debuts Category:2010s Canadian children's television series Category:Canadian television films Category:YTV (TV channel) original programming Category:Television series by 9 Story Media Group
title: Bruno & Boots (TV series)
